usage: Used for strength and resistance training exercises at home, in fitness classes, or in a gym setting.
key_features: Pair of 1 KG neoprene-coated dumbbells for a total of 2 KG
Cast iron core with durable neoprene coating
Anti-slip, comfortable grip for secure handling
Printed weight number on each end cap for easy identification
Color-coded pink design to quickly spot the right weight
Hexagonal shape prevents dumbbells from rolling away
Suitable for home gym, fitness classes, and resistance training
Non-toxic guarantee badge shown for added peace of mind
ai_description: Pair of pink KAKSS neoprene dumbbells, 1 KG each, with printed weight and hexagonal, non-slip design. Shown in home and gym workouts, they offer a secure grip and non-toxic coated surface for safe, comfortable strength training.
target_audience: Home exercisers, fitness enthusiasts, beginners, and class participants looking for light, easy-grip dumbbells.
product_name: Kakss Neoprene Dumbbells 1+1=2 KG Pack of 1 KG Each, Anti-Slip Coated Hand Weights for Home Gym & Fitness Training - Pink
